title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items move below the label on Linux using build 20011127. This behavior was not observed on build 20011116 on Nt2000.
OB: When resizing the Navigator view to a smaller size on Linux using build 20011127, the tool items move below the label.
EB: When resizing the Navigator view to a smaller size on Linux using build 20011127, the tool items should remain aligned with the label.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Check if the tool items remain aligned with the label.
